thesis.title: AI-Driven Multi-Modal Data Analysis for Nuclear Fusion
thesis.venue: Final Degree Thesis, IE University (IBM & CIEMAT)
thesis.summary: GenAI system for fusion experiments: CSV retrieval, natural language querying, and signal visualization with similar-pattern search.

papers.title: Kernel Ridge Regression Estimation of High-Frequency Signals for Nuclear Fusion Diagnostics
papers.summary: KRR-based estimation pipeline for reconstructing diagnostics data with high temporal resolution.

papers.title: Generative AI for Similar-Pattern Retrieval in Fusion Signals
papers.summary: Agentic approach integrating signal processing with conversational retrieval and plotting.
